::Zardus/Shredder/Mosquitor/Zeus/Killer/Annihilator::

Zardus nods as Hell Beast's message is played by the Alliance base's comp.

"Meet me at the former standing-stones, Hell Beast. I have to take care of 
something first, though." He replies and leans back, waiting for Nemesis to 
report.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Shredder grunts as he recieves Megatron's message. He growls and turns around 
to walk back toward the predacon base.

"I'm on my way, Megatron," He says into his comm-link.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Mosquitor recieves Hell Beast's message and runs off toward the predacon base 
with Zeus chasing him and firing rapidly.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Killer and Annihilator keep firing at Rampage and Inferno.
